alert.note: Alert for Hill County; Northern Blaine County (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 02 at 1:33PM MDT until November 03 at 8:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations up to one inch and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Hill County and Northern Blaine County. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 8 AM MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of concern are largely along and north of the US Highway 2 corridor. Precipitation will end from west to east Friday morning, but slick roads may remain for a few hours after precipitation ends.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.
